          <title>
            <string language="en">Partition of bromine between water and tribomethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partition des Broms zwischen Wasser und 
tribomethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cloison du brome entre l'eau et le tribomethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Divisória do bromo entre a água e o 
tribomethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Divisorio di bromo fra acqua e tribomethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χώρισμα του βρωμίου μεταξύ του ύδατος και 
tribomethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Partición del bromo entre el agua y el 
tribomethane</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the partition of bromine between two non-mixing liquids, water and tribromomethane. When equilibrium is achieved, the solute molecules of bromine are distributed in a definite ratio between the two liquids.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equilibrium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">partition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tribromomethane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Partition des Broms 
zwischen zwei nicht-mischenden Flüssigkeiten, Wasser und 
tribromomethane. Wenn Gleichgewicht erzielt wird, werden die 
Stoffmoleküle des Broms in ein definitives Verhältnis zwischen den 
zwei Flüssigkeiten verteilt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la cloison du brome 
entre deux liquides, eaux et tribromomethane demélange. Quand 
l'équilibre est réalisé, les molécules de corps dissous du brome 
sont distribuées dans un taux défini entre les deux liquides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a divisória de um bromo
entre dois líquidos, águas e tribromomethane non-misturando. 
Quando o equilíbrio é conseguido, as moléculas do solute do 
bromo estão distribuídas em uma relação definitiva entre os dois 
líquidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il divisorio del 
bromo fra due liquidi, acqua e tribromomethane dimiscelazione. 
Quando l'equilibrio è realizzato, le molecole del soluto del 
bromo sono distribuite in un rapporto definito fra i due liquidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το χώρισμα του βρωμίου 
μεταξύ δύο μη-αναμιγνύοντας τα υγρά, ύδωρ και tribromomethane.
Όταν η ισορροπία επιτυγχάνεται, τα μόρια διαλυτής ουσίας 
του βρωμίου διανέμονται σε καθορισμένη αναλογία μεταξύ των δύο 
υγρών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la partición del bromo
entre dos líquidos, aguas y tribromomethane no-que se mezclan. 
Cuando se alcanza el equilibrio, las moléculas del solute del 
bromo se distribuyen en una relación de transformación definida 
entre los dos líquidos.</string>
          </description>
